mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into data_collection
name, case_id, expect_time, dept, seqno, case_type, archive_no, card_no, account, case_date, contact_date, result_id, target_name, relation, collect_info, collect_time, mobile, tel_type, area, odv, remark,
new_case, case_allot_time, case_status,
account_age, en_repay_amt, pay_name, pay_method, confim_name, money, balance, m_val, next_foll_date,
last_foll_date, count_follow, last_phone_time, leave_days,
reduce_amt, reduce_status, reduce_update_time, reduce_refer_time,
color, bail_date, measure, method, repay_time,
bank_time, bank_amt, repay_amt, collect_status, complete_user,
complete_time, client, batch_no, ident_no, collection_type,
repay_status, over_days, remind,
tel_phone,
tel_name, new_money, module, result, delete_flag, create_time,
values
#{name}, #{caseId}, #{expectTime}, #{dept}, #{seqno}, #{caseType}, #{archiveNo}, #{cardNo}, #{account}, #{caseDate}, #{contractDate}, #{resultId}, #{targetName}, #{relation}, #{collectInfo}, #{collectTime}, #{mobile}, #{telType}, #{area}, #{odv}, #{remark},
#{newCase}, #{caseAllotTime}, #{caseStatus},
#{accountAge}, #{enRepayAmt}, #{payName}, #{payMethod}, #{confimName}, #{money}, #{balance}, #{mVal}, #{nextFollDate},
#{lastFollDate}, #{countFollow}, #{lastPhoneTime}, #{leaveDays},
#{reduceAmt}, #{reduceStatus}, #{reduceUpdateTime}, #{reduceReferTime},
#{color}, #{bailDate}, #{measure}, #{method}, #{repayTime},
#{bankTime}, #{bankAmt}, #{repayAmt}, #{collectStatus}, #{completeUser},
#{completeTime}, #{client}, #{batchNo}, #{identNo}, #{collectionType},
#{repayStatus}, #{overDays}, #{remind},
#{telPhone},
#{telName}, #{newMoney}, #{module}, #{result}, 0, now(),
mapper.delete: update data_collection set delete_flag =1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id,dept,create_time as createTime from data_collection
delete_flag = 0
AND dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
select count(t.id) from data_case t where t.odv=#{odv} and DATE_FORMAT(t.distribute_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{caseAllotTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update data_collection set collect_status = #{collectStatus} where batch_no = #{batchNo} and ident_no = #{identNo}
mapper.select:
select count(id) as sum from data_collection
delete_flag = 0
AND dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
AND area like CONCAT('%',#{area},'%')
AND odv like CONCAT('%',#{odv},'%')
AND measure like CONCAT('%',#{measure},'%')
AND measure like CONCAT('%',#{collectMeasure},'%')
and client in
#{item}
and batch_no in
#{item}
AND case_status like CONCAT('%',#{caseStatus},'%')
AND result like CONCAT('%',#{result},'%')
AND ident_no like CONCAT('%',#{identNo},'%')
AND card_no like CONCAT('%',#{cardNo},'%')
AND collect_info like CONCAT('%',#{collectInfo},'%')
AND color like CONCAT('%',#{color},'%')
AND seqno like CONCAT('%',#{seqno},'%')
AND target_name like CONCAT('%',#{targetName},'%')
and account_age = #{accountAge}
and ident_no = #{identNo}
and collect_status = #{collectStatus}
and case_type = #{caseType}
and archive_no = #{archiveNo}
and new_case = #{newCase}
and repay_status = #{repayStatus}
and remark = #{remark}
AND tel_name like CONCAT('%',#{telName},'%')
AND tel_phone like CONCAT('%',#{telPhone},'%')
AND tel_phone like CONCAT('%',#{collectPhoneAddr},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(case_allot_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{caseAllotTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(case_allot_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{caseAllotTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(next_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{nextFollDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(next_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{nextFollDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(last_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastFollDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(last_foll_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastFollDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(bail_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{bailStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(bail_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{bailEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(collect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{collectStartTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(collect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{collectEndTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(case_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{caseDateStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(case_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{caseDateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(repay_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and t.money>= #{moneyStart}
and t.money<= #{moneyEnd}

select t.name,t.account,t.card_no as cardNo,t.ident_no as identNo,t.archive_no as archiveNo,t.seq_no as seqNo,t.account_age as accountAge,t.money,t.residual_principle as residualPrinciple, c.target_name as targetName,c.relation,c.tel_phone as collectPhoneAddr,c.tel_type as contractType, c.result,t.odv,c.method,c.collect_status as collectStatus,t.pro_repay_date as proRepayDate,t.pro_repay_amt as proRepayAmt, c.reduce_amt as reduceAmt,c.reduce_status as reduceStatus,c.collect_info as collectInfo,t.over_days as overDays,t.batch_no as batchNo, t.case_date as caseDate,t.expect_time as expectTime,c.new_money as newMoney,t.province,t.city,t.county,t.currency_type as currencyType, t.apply_order_no as applyOrderNo,t.overdue_money as overdueMoney,t.remark,c.next_foll_date as nextFollDate,t.minimum_payment as minimumPayment, t.credit_line as creditLine,c.module from data_collection c LEFT JOIN data_case t on c.case_id = t.id where c.id in
#{item}

select t.name,t.account,t.card_no as cardNo,t.ident_no as identNo,t.archive_no as archiveNo,t.seq_no as seqNo,t.account_age as accountAge,t.money,t.residual_principle as residualPrinciple, c.target_name as targetName,c.relation,c.tel_phone as collectPhoneAddr,c.tel_type as contractType, c.result,t.odv,c.method,c.collect_status as collectStatus,t.pro_repay_date as proRepayDate,t.pro_repay_amt as proRepayAmt, c.reduce_amt as reduceAmt,c.reduce_status as reduceStatus,c.collect_info as collectInfo,t.over_days as overDays,t.batch_no as batchNo, t.case_date as caseDate,t.expect_time as expectTime,c.new_money as newMoney,t.province,t.city,t.county,t.currency_type as currencyType, t.apply_order_no as applyOrderNo,t.overdue_money as overdueMoney,t.remark,c.next_foll_date as nextFollDate,t.minimum_payment as minimumPayment, t.credit_line as creditLine,c.module from data_collection c LEFT JOIN data_case t on c.case_id = t.id where t.batch_no in
#{item}

select t.name,t.account,t.card_no as cardNo,t.ident_no as identNo,t.archive_no as archiveNo,t.seq_no as seqNo,t.account_age as accountAge,t.money,t.residual_principle as residualPrinciple, c.target_name as targetName,c.relation,c.tel_phone as collectPhoneAddr,c.tel_type as contractType, c.result,t.odv,c.method,c.collect_status as collectStatus,t.pro_repay_date as proRepayDate,t.pro_repay_amt as proRepayAmt, c.reduce_amt as reduceAmt,c.reduce_status as reduceStatus,c.collect_info as collectInfo,t.over_days as overDays,t.batch_no as batchNo, t.case_date as caseDate,t.expect_time as expectTime,c.new_money as newMoney,t.province,t.city,t.county,t.currency_type as currencyType, t.apply_order_no as applyOrderNo,t.overdue_money as overdueMoney,t.remark,c.next_foll_date as nextFollDate,t.minimum_payment as minimumPayment, t.credit_line as creditLine,c.module from data_collection c LEFT JOIN data_case t on c.case_id = t.id where c.case_id in
#{item}

SELECT c.batch_no as batchNo,dc.target_name as targetName,c.seq_no as seqno,c.client,c.account_age as accountAge, c.money,c.m_val as mVal,c.bank_amt as bankAmt,dc.bank_time as bankTime, IFNULL(c.bank_amt*c.m_val,0) as repaidAmtM, IFNULL(c.pro_repay_amt*c.m_val,0) as repaidBankAmtM, c.pro_repay_amt as repayAmt, c.pro_repay_date as repayTime,c.en_repay_amt as enRepayAmt, c.expect_time as expectTime,dc.pay_name as payName,dc.pay_method as payMethod,dc.confim_name as confimName, dc.confim_time as confimTime from data_collection dc LEFT JOIN data_case c on dc.case_id = c.id where dc.delete_flag = 0
AND target_name like CONCAT('%',#{targetName},'%')
AND c.dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
AND c.odv like CONCAT('%',#{odv},'%')
and c.odv in
#{item}
and c.client in
#{item}
and c.batch_no in
#{item}
and c.account_age = #{accountAge}
and DATE_FORMAT(c.pro_repay_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.pro_repay_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMATd(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT count(1) as sum from data_collection dc LEFT JOIN data_case c on dc.case_id = c.id where dc.delete_flag = 0
AND target_name like CONCAT('%',#{targetName},'%')
AND c.dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
AND c.odv like CONCAT('%',#{odv},'%')
and c.odv in
#{item}
and c.client in
#{item}
and c.batch_no in
#{item}
and c.account_age = #{accountAge}
and DATE_FORMAT(c.pro_repay_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.pro_repay_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMATd(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT IFNULL(sum(c.en_repay_amt),0) as paidMoney , IFNULL(sum(c.bank_amt),0) as bankAmtC, IFNULL(sum(c.pro_repay_amt),0) as repayAmtP, IFNULL(sum(c.en_repay_amt*dc.m_val),0) as repaidAmt,IFNULL(sum(c.bank_amt*c.m_val),0) as repaidBankAmt from data_collection dc LEFT JOIN data_case c on dc.case_id = c.id where dc.delete_flag = 0
and DATE_FORMAT(c.pro_repay_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{monthStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.pro_repay_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{monthEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND c.dept like CONCAT('%',#{dept},'%')
AND c.odv like CONCAT('%',#{odv},'%')
AND client like CONCAT('%',#{client},'%')
and c.batch_no = #{batchNo}
and c.account_age = #{accountAge}
and DATE_FORMAT(c.pro_repay_date, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.pro_repay_date, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{repayTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMATd(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dc.bank_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{bankTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')>= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.expect_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{expectTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update data_collection set color = #{color} where case_id = #{caseId}
update data_collection set collect_status = #{collectStatus} where case_id = #{caseId}
mapper.select: select id,measure,collect_time as collectTime,target_name as targetName,relation,tel_phone as telPhone,collection_type as collectionType, result,target_name as targetName,method,repay_time as repayTime,repay_amt as repayAmt,reduce_amt as reduceAmt,reduce_status as reduceStatus,odv,collect_status as collectStatus, batch_no as batchNo,ident_no as identNo from data_collection where case_id = #{caseId}

select t1.id,t1.measure,t1.collect_time as collectTime,t1.target_name as targetName,t1.relation,t1.mobile,t1.collection_type as collectionType,t1.tel_type as telType,t1.collect_info as collectInfo, t1.result,t1.method,t1.repay_time as repayTime,t1.repay_amt as repayAmt,t1.reduce_amt as reduceAmt,t1.reduce_status as reduceStatus,t2.odv,t1.collect_status as collectStatus,t1.create_user as 'createUser.id' from data_collection t1 LEFT JOIN data_case t2 on t1.case_id = t2.id where t1.case_id = #{caseId} and t2.delete_flag=0

select d.id,d.measure,d.collect_time as collectTime,d.target_name as targetName,d.relation,d.mobile,d.collection_type as collectionType,tel_type as telType,collect_info as collectInfo, d.result,d.method,d.repay_time as repayTime,d.repay_amt as repayAmt,d.reduce_amt as reduceAmt,d.reduce_status as reduceStatus,t.odv,d.collect_status as collectStatus,d.create_user as 'createUser.id' from data_collection d LEFT join data_case t on d.case_id = t.id where t.batch_no = #{batchNo} and t.ident_no = #{identNo} and t.delete_flag=0

select d.id,d.measure,d.collect_time as collectTime,d.target_name as targetName,d.relation,d.mobile,d.collection_type as collectionType,tel_type as telType,collect_info as collectInfo, d.result,d.method,d.repay_time as repayTime,d.repay_amt as repayAmt,d.reduce_amt as reduceAmt,d.reduce_status as reduceStatus,t.odv,d.collect_status as collectStatus,d.create_user as 'createUser.id' from data_collection d LEFT join data_case t on d.case_id = t.id where t.ident_no = #{identNo} and t.delete_flag=0

select d.id,d.measure,d.collect_time as collectTime,d.target_name as targetName,d.relation,d.mobile,d.collection_type as collectionType,tel_type as telType,collect_info as collectInfo, d.result,d.method,d.repay_time as repayTime,d.repay_amt as repayAmt,d.reduce_amt as reduceAmt,d.reduce_status as reduceStatus,t.odv,d.collect_status as collectStatus,d.create_user as 'createUser.id' from data_collection d LEFT join data_case t on d.case_id = t.id where t.card_no = #{cardNo} and t.ident_no = #{identNo} and t.delete_flag=0

select id,collect_time as collectTime,target_name as targetName,mobile,collect_info as collectInfo,result, repay_time as repayTime,repay_amt as repayAmt,odv from data_collection where case_id=#{caseId} and mobile = #{mobile}

select id,collect_time as collectTime,target_name as targetName,mobile,collect_info as collectInfo,result, repay_time as repayTime,repay_amt as repayAmt,odv from data_collection where mobile = #{mobile}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into data_collection
case_id, target_name, relation, collect_info, mobile, tel_type, measure, delete_flag, create_time,
values
#{caseId}, #{targetName}, #{relation}, #{collectInfo}, #{mobile}, #{telType}, #{measure}, 0, now(),
mapper.update: update data_collection set target_name =#{targetName},relation = #{relation},collect_info=#{collectInfo},mobile=#{mobile},tel_type=#{telType}, measure = #{measure} where id=#{id}
mapper.delete: update data_collection set delete_flag = 1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id ,case_id as caseId from data_collection where id = #{id}
